feature.label: Purdue Robotics Operation System
feature.description: PROS is a lightweight and fast alternative operating system for the VEX Cortex Microcontroller. It features multitasking, low-level control, and Wiring compatible functions to harness the full power of the Cortex. The Purdue Robotics Operating System Eclipse feature provides an Eclipse perspective, wizards for creating PROS-based projects, and tools to communicate with the Cortex Microcontroller.
